item.title: Report on Post-Quantum Cryptography
item.description: Authors: Lily Chen, Stephen Jordan, Yi-Kai Liu, Dustin Moody, Rene Peralta, Ray Perlner, Daniel Smith-Tone Published: April 2016 URL: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/ir/2016/NIST.IR.8105.pdf Abstract: In recent years, there has been a substantial amount of research on quantum computers â€“machines that exploit quantum mechanical phenomena to solve mathematical problems that are difficult or intractable for conventional computers. If large-scale quantum computers are ever built, they will be able to break many of the public-key cryptosystems currently in use.
